sentence: March 4 () - Cloud-based business software maker Salesforce.com Inc reported a nearly 26 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Monday, as customers looking to rein in costs boosted demand for its flagship Sales Cloud business.
Net income rose to $362 million, or 46 cents per share, in the fourth quarter ended Jan. 31., from $206 million, or 28 cents per share, a year earlier.
